comprehensive_overview: Rasterio is a Python library for reading and writing geospatial raster datasets. It is built on the capabilities of the GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library) and provides easy access to the functionalities for opening, reading, and writing geospatial raster data formats.
core_features: Read and write geospatial raster datasets
Access metadata and geospatial information of raster datasets
Manipulate raster data through various functions and operations
Integration with other geospatial libraries and tools
